rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 26 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 11:00 PM, 21 June 2025(Saturday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Quezon, Nueva Ecija, Zambales, Pampanga and Tarlac within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Bulacan(Dona Remedios Trinidad, San Miguel) and Bataan(Bagac, Mariveles, Limay) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
